About.Hours & facilities: Open Tuesday and Thursday by appointment only; closed in school holidays. General reference and copying services available.

About.Access: Records relating to the development, history and operation of the School and memorabilia from past students and staff.

About.Acquisition focus: Materials related to the development, history and day-to-day procedures of the school (80% in-house, 20% collecting).

About.Major holdings: School Magazines 1912-. School Council Minutes 1920-. School Memorabilia and Photographs 1900-.
